articles.title: Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine works very well against the Delta variant - but only after 2 doses - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The study on 19,000 people in the UK found one Pfizer shot was about 36% effective against Delta, but it was highly effective after two shots.
